PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-08272020-10-23,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ECCC, 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectOrder Declaring that the Provisions of the Regulations Respecting Reduction in the Release of Methane and Certain Volatile Organic Compounds (Upstream Oil and Gas Sector) Do Not Apply in Saskatchewan
PrecisORDER DECLARING THAT THE PROVISIONS OF THE REGULATIONS RESPECTING REDUCTION IN THE RELEASE OF METHANE AND CERTAIN VOLATILE ORGANIC COMPOUNDS (UPSTREAM OIL AND GAS SECTOR) DO NOT APPLY IN SASKATCHEWAN in order to stand down the application of the federal regulations to facilities in Saskatchewan, with the exception of federal works or undertakings as defined in subsection 3(1) of the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999 (CEPA).
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0234 Publication Date: 2020-11-11
AttachmentsAttachment
